entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -26.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 11:39 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -26.8°C
Pressure: 104.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -31.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
